meanings.definition: The number or amount of people who use a particular form of transportation.
meanings.sent1: The riderships on the bus increased after the new route was added.
meanings.sent2: The riderships on the subway peak during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The riderships on the tiny clown car made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The riderships on the ferry were like a bustling ant colony.
meanings.sent5: The riderships on the train were so crowded, it felt like a sardine can.

meanings.definition: The collective group of people who use a particular form of transportation.
meanings.sent1: Many riderships waited at the bus stop for the delayed arrival.
meanings.sent2: The riderships on the cruise ship enjoyed the sunny weather.
meanings.sent3: The riderships on the hot air balloon waved to people below.
meanings.sent4: The riderships on the roller coaster screamed with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The riderships on the spaceship marveled at the view of Earth.
